documents.document: @DCCelebrity @IFeelPretty @amyschumer @aplusk It opens Friday... I spoke too soon, but we'll check the weekend numbers next Monday. All the best to her!

Now I have this visual in my head lol... Thanks Kim. So who held your leg when you pushed? https://t.co/a5XZR8xkq2
I know who 4 of the 10 #DWTS new cast members are. They don't call it Dancing With The "Stars" for nothing. I guess.
STOP. https://t.co/0hxVA5luj4

What's hilarious is the other night I was out with some girl friends and we were joking about turning the abandoned K-Mart in the neighborhood into a rave. We were kidding, of course. https://t.co/67QIMteFQj
@ThePerezHilton https://t.co/h4FYXBKObg

@QUEENjessone @pogg71alex It's all very strange. The timing... what was really going on with them... None of us will ever know. She posted a lot of happy pictures on Instagram of them together though, up until last week.
@QUEENjessone @pogg71alex Totally. Cameras everywhere and he did it in public. It's weird it just came out now... someone sat on that tape from October for 6 months!

@QUEENjessone @khloekardashian I think she was 38 weeks at this point so the baby should be fine.. And yes I agree, it is really sad she is dealing with all of this. I just think the fact that he didn't care what he was doing to her is very sad... maybe not the saddest though
@_Neiden_ @DeborahVRose @ThePerezHilton You are totally entitled to your feelings, I just don't think she meant any harm to other women.

@_Neiden_ @DeborahVRose @ThePerezHilton Her lie to her husband has nothing to do with anyone else's issues. I don't tell people they can't make "your mother" jokes because I lost mine. We have to stop being so offended by other people's benign words. She didn't do it to hurt anyone else.
@_Neiden_ @DeborahVRose @ThePerezHilton I think she knew he had issues... But she still wanted a family with him, obviously or she wouldn't have stayed with him for so long.
I wonder if #KhloeKardashian hasn't given the baby a name yet because it was going to be something related to Tristan or his family and she's now like NOPE.
The baby is here!! https://t.co/eV6SVNJaCT
@Neelielikewoa I refrained from "At least he didn't turn out to be a crackhead"

@darikforeal @947FreshFM How did you hold in your anger??? I found out when the other woman sent me an IM on AOL lol... I will refrain from tagging him bc it's all in the past 😂 #BlockedInDC

@pogg71alex The timing of it all coming out is certainly suspect... One of the videos is from October. Why is it just leaking now when she's about to pop?
@pogg71alex You think there are all of these #TristanThompson lookalikes running around with women and he's innocent? Possible... but not likely, especially given his past.
